title: Learning from a Mistake
description: Daniel talks about a mistake at work and what he learned from it.
speaker: Daniel
text: A few months ago, I made a mistake at work that taught me an important lesson.
I was responsible for organizing a small presentation for my team.
Because I was busy, I did not prepare well and assumed everything would go smoothly.
On the day of the presentation, I forgot to bring some important documents.
As a result, the meeting was delayed, and I felt embarrassed in front of my colleagues.
After the meeting, my manager spoke to me and explained what I could do better next time.
Instead of getting angry, I listened carefully and took his advice seriously.
Since then, I have become more organized and always prepare in advance.
This experience helped me understand the value of responsibility and preparation.
